Review Text: "Mishthy Yog Sadhna near Awadh Puri Police Chowki has a great atmosphere. The gym is well-maintained and the staff are friendly. It`s a perfect place to work out and relax. Excellent!"

"Sapna ma`am is an excellent yoga teacher. I am having an experience of lifetime after joining her. I had gone to her with a trouble of back pain and migraine. Guruji taught me simple breathing exercise and other exercise which have given me a lot of relief. She teaches with a lot of heart. I wish to go all cured with her."

"Center per meditation, sound healin bahut acchi tarike se karaya jata hai aur bahut relax feel hota hai Radhe Radhe" (Meditation and sound healing is done very well at the center and one feels very relaxed.)

"I had a wonderful time at Mishthy Yog Sadhna, a great gym and club. The amenities are excellent! The gym has many machines for exercise. There are also nice spaces for yoga and relaxation. The staff is friendly and helps everyone... Overall, Mishthy Yog Sadhna is an amazing place to stay fit and healthy!"

"Mishthy Yog Sadhna is an excellent gym! The trainers are very knowledgeable and help me a lot. The amenities are great, and the equipment is of high quality. It is spacious and air-conditioned... Highly recommend!"

"MISTHY YOG SADHNA a place of worship or a place of heaven for me... The Aura of that place is very high everything is positive... and also the trainers focus on every person. Not only this much but also the main person of this institute SAPNA MAAM` she is the only one who gaves me inspiration and motivation..."

"Great place to learn Authentic Yoga.The teacher have in depth knowledge and experience in teaching Yoga. The ambience is also really good. Yoga is not a set of exercises, it is much bigger science to unite body, mind and spirit... Must recommended for all"

"Mishthy Yog Sadhna offers a top-notch experience with knowledgeable trainers, quality equipment, and spacious facilities. They offer multiple package options to cater to different fitness needs. The perfect place for a holistic approach to health and wellness."
"She is best yoga teacher in Agra.she teaches us as her child.and she is grand master of reiki one word for her she is our guru maa"

"Mishthy Yog Sadhna is an excellent gym and yoga club that offers a wide range of facilities. The location is easily accessible and well connected. The gym is spacious, air-conditioned, and well-maintained... Overall, it is a great place to achieve fitness goals in a comfortable and supportive environment."

"Mishthy Yog Sadhna is an excellent yoga center with well-maintained facilities and great amenities. The personal trainers are highly knowledgeable and supportive. It`s well priced and easily accessible..."
"Perfect place for change ur life by yoga, reiki, sapna mam just like an angel she always helpful and understanding ur problem"
"The Reiki sessions of Sapna mam are truly transformative! Her expertise and kindness have made a significant impact on my life. I`m forever grateful."

"I really thankful to misty yog sadhna centre. it is a great place to learn meditation, I got cured from anxiety, negativity and depression. I am fully satisfied and I thank especially to sapna mam for her blessings."

"Sapna Ma`am is a great teacher I benefitted a lot by the exercises she taught us and my backache is also relieved I highly recommend her as she can bring in a big change in your overall health"
